author: Les Brown
quote: Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss, you'll land among the stars

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: I have always said that everyone is in sales. Maybe you don't hold the title of salesperson, but if the business you are in requires you to deal with people, you, my friend, are in sales.

author: Les Brown
quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.

author: Les Brown
quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
